climbs.name: Playground Psychotic
climbs.fa: Mark Ashworth and Steve Cuddieback - May 1996

content.description: Follow the the line of 8 bolts up this finely bolted slab. Its possible to create a 2 pitch route to the top of Buddha's Throne by doing Cringer Maker (5.10b/c) as the second pitch, it shares the same bottom belay anchores as the top of Playground Psychotic.
content.location: Located on the dowhill side of Buddahs throne on the lower angle slab leading up to the base of Cringer Maker.

climbs.name: Cringer Maker
climbs.fa: Steve Cuddieback and Mark Ashworth - March 1996

content.description: 5 bolts up the shortest edge of Buddha's Throne. Is possible to climb Playground Psychotic (5.7) as a first pitch.
content.location: On the shortest egde of Buddha's Throne, scramble to base and belay atop anchors of Playground Psychotic.

content.description: The area with the highest concentration of easy routes.
